definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: It is centrally controlled and top-down in nature.
sentences.chinese: 它在本質上屬於中央控制和自上而下的模式。

sentences.english: But CAST alone cannot change the top-down model for popularisation.
sentences.chinese: 然而中國科協自身無法改變這種自上而下的普及模式。

sentences.english: Project portfolio management is introduced in a three steps, top-down approach.
sentences.chinese: 項目組合管理將會以自上而下的方法分三步來介紹。
第二，自上而下的思維方法。

sentences.english: Kneading calf with finger tip muscle from top 10 times.
sentences.chinese: 指端揉捏小腿用卜肌自上而下10次。

sentences.english: The outer surface of the guide post is in a wavy shape matched with the arc-shaped inner concave head form top to bottom.
sentences.chinese: 導柱外表面自上而下呈與弧形內凸頭配合的波浪狀。

sentences.english: Top-down discrimination, such as a scourge, was out of control.
sentences.chinese: 自上而下的歧視如洪水猛獸，一發不可收拾。

sentences.english: See-through top may also be sought out as the season becomes hotter.
sentences.chinese: 見通過自上而下也可徵詢隨着賽季的進行變得更熱。

sentences.english: The fact is that what we’re experiencing right now is a top-down disaster.
sentences.chinese: 事實是，我們現在經受的是一場自上而下的災難。

sentences.english: Delves into top-down investment methodology as well as individual security analysis.
sentences.chinese: 深入研究了自上而下的投資方法，以及個人安全分析。

definition: upward/up/to advance/to try to improve oneself/to make progress
gradual progress/to go forward one stage at a time
to run through/a connecting thread from beginning to end/to link
